Department: Nursing/Alice Lee Ctr For Nursing Stud
ModuleDescription: This module aims to provide students with an understanding of the theoretical knowledge and evidence-based skills needed by the advanced practice nurse in diagnosing and managing physiological alterations involving the cardiovascular, respiratory, and gastrointestinal systems in the critically ill population. It focuses on pathologies that may involve these systems of the body. Through continuous didactic learning sessions reinforced by practical sessions, the students will enhance their competency in planning, implementing and evaluating care for critically ill patients with complex conditions.
